Courseware Accessibility Study - 1999

By Greg Gay, Laurie Harrison, Jan Richards, and Jutta Treviranus

This preliminary study, completed in 1999, evaluated Courseware Products for their support of accessible design and access to persons with disabilities.

  • Background, Descriptions and, Rationale
  • Scoring
  • Summary of the methodology and results
  • Zip file containing all evaluations (Excel)

Packages Evaluated

  • CourseInfo
  • Topclass
  • Web Course in a Box
  • Virtual-U
  • Web Knowledge Forum
  • WebCT
  • Lotus Learning Space
